# [FEAT] Custom Workflows Builder

## Labels
`automation`, `customization`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement a visual workflow builder for creating complex, multi-step automated processes.

## Requirements

### Workflow Designer
- Visual drag-and-drop interface
- Workflow canvas
- Step connections/flow lines
- Branching and conditions
- Parallel paths
- Loop support

### Workflow Steps
- Trigger step (entry point)
- Condition/decision nodes
- Action steps
- Wait/delay steps
- Sub-workflow calls
- Exit points

### Step Types
- Send email
- Update ticket
- Assign ticket
- Create task
- Send webhook
- Wait for event
- Wait for time
- Human approval step

### Workflow Management
- Version control
- Publish/draft states
- Workflow templates
- Import/export
- Workflow documentation

### Execution
- Real-time execution tracking
- Error handling
- Retry logic
- Execution history
- Debug mode

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk offers customizable platform workflows to align with business operations and complex support scenarios.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Visual workflow builder
- [ ] All step types implemented
- [ ] Branching logic works
- [ ] Version control available
- [ ] Execution tracking works
